square.power.failure

Class SecondaryPowerFail

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.power.Power
      • square.power.failure.PowerFail
        • square.power.failure.SecondaryPowerFail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableEffect

    public class SecondaryPowerFail
extends PowerFail
    Secondary power failure lasts for 2 actions. The secondary power failure has one child.
    Author:
    vincentreniers
